column3: I like to watch Gerolt pound away, but he spends far more time draining a bottle than holding his hammer. He drinks so much, he should've been born a cask of mead, kupo.
The other day when Gerolt was deep in his cups, I overheard him mumbling something cryptic, kupo.
bxe2\x80\x9cIf ye've got a bottle o' Thavnairian misht
column4: ye can infushe shpiritsh into yer relicsh at the furnashe.\xe2\x80\x9d\x02\x10\x01\x03...I wonder what that means
